option.advancedautopilot.debug: Show debug information in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.emergencyLandin: Perform emergency landing when elytra durability is low
option.advancedautopilot.maxElytraSwapDu: Maximum durability to swap elytra at
option.advancedautopilot.maxEmergencyLan: Maximum elytra durability to perform emergency landing at
option.advancedautopilot.maxPoweredFligh: Maximum speed to use rockets at while gliding (m/s)
option.advancedautopilot.minElytraSwapRe: Minimum durability for replacement elytra during swap
option.advancedautopilot.minRiskyLanding: Minimum height to start or continue a risky landing (m)
option.advancedautopilot.poweredFlight: Use rockets while gliding to increase speed
option.advancedautopilot.refillRockets: Refill rockets from inventory into main hand
option.advancedautopilot.riskyLanding: Perform a risky landing by diving straight down while high enough
option.advancedautopilot.showAnglesInHud: Show pitch and yaw in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.showAverageSpee: Show average speed in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.showConfigOptio: Show config options in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.showPilotStateI: Show extra pilot state information in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.swapElytra: Swap out elytra when durability is low
text.advancedautopilot.disengagedAutopil: Disengaged autopilot because player is not flying
Disengaged autopilot because player touched liquid
text.advancedautopilot.notFlying: Start flying before engaging the autopilot
text.advancedautopilot.swappedElytra: Swapped out elytra with low durability
tooltip.advancedautopilot.emergencyLandi: If elytra swap is enabled, this only activates when all elytra have low durability
